FuncDef:
The if-match mac-list command configures a matching rule based on a MAC address list.
The undo if-match mac-list command cancels the configuration. The if-match mac-list command configures a matching rule based on a MAC address list. The undo if-match mac-list command cancels the configuration. By default, no matching rule based on a MAC address list is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a MAC address list.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo: To configure an EVPN route matching rule based on a MAC address list, run the if-match mac-list command.
